resources.string: I am Dao and this is my first Android App. I am a Mechanical Engineer at Philips. I have a dream to become a Software Developer. I am married with two kids. I like watching and playing soccer.

This is my first android app. I have learned how to create several layouts for android app including Constraint, Linear, Relative, Grid, RecylerView and this week I learned about Navigation Drawer and option setting menu for our app. I also created multiple activities and linked them together using onClick and Navigation Drawer. Thanks for looking at my app. I am looking to build a better and better app everyday in this class.
